  • Field Details

    • wait_time

      public static long wait_time
      The default wait time. In milliseconds.

      Used by wait(SimplePredicate).

  • Method Details

    • currentTimeMillis

      public static long currentTimeMillis()
      Returns the current time in milliseconds using System.nanoTime() to avoid problems with changing clock times.
      Returns:
      The current time in milliseconds.
      See Also:
      System.currentTimeMillis(), System.nanoTime()

    • currentTime

      public static long currentTime​(TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Returns the current time represented by the specified TimeUnit.
      Parameters:
      timeUnit - The TimeUnit of the returned value.
      Returns:
      The current time represented by the specified TimeUnit.
      See Also:
      currentTimeMillis(), System.currentTimeMillis()

    • wait

      public static boolean wait​(SimplePredicate condition)
      Waits for the specified SimplePredicate to be active. Uses the default wait_time as the timeout.
      Parameters:
      condition - The SimplePredicate.
      Returns:
      True if the SimplePredicate was met before the timeout, false otherwise.

    • wait

      public static boolean wait​(SimplePredicate condition, long timeout)
      Waits for the specified SimplePredicate to be active.
      Parameters:
      condition - The SimplePredicate.
      timeout - The timeout. In milliseconds. -1 for no timeout.
      Returns:
      True if the SimplePredicate was met before the timeout, false otherwise.
